casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Leroy DAVIS, Jr., Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157067
COA: 334595 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 1, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the November 16, 2017 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.
